title: Moebius - the horny goof and other underground stories [CBR]
description:
Moebius 0 - the horny goof and other underground stories
  - the forbidden work of Jean Giraud
  Darkhorse Graphic novel

Allthoug I already uploaded 'The horny goof' in the 'Stories from heavy metal' torrent, this version is colored and edited with new insertions, and contains several other Moebius pearls not to be missed.


Quoting the editor on page five:

"UNDER THE SURFACE OF THINGS TO COME

At last, in this volume, we are able to present some of MoebiusÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s better-known ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œundergroundÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ stories. They display the influence of the American Underground, especially Robert Crumb, whose work had just reached France in the early 1970s. The stories were all published in various French magazines, just before the creation of the famous Metal Hurlant magazine in 1975.
The most famous of these stories is undoubtedly The Horny Goof. As with The Airtight Garage, we have chosen to retain the title by which this story is best kncwn in America, although a better translation of its original French title (Le Bandard Fou )would be the Wild Horny Pecker.
Whatever its title, The Horny Goof is interesting on several levels: its combination of bawdy humor and fairly sophisticated science-fiction is a rare one, a style best done by Philip Jose Farmer. Those who love comics in-jokes will delight in finding, on pages 11 and 12, an homage to the pirate Red-Beard, a character created by Jean-Michel Charlier and Victor Hubinon, but also known for his hilarious, disastrous encounters with the indomitable Asterix and Obelix.
Last but not least is the fact that the story is a prequel of sorts to The Airtight Garage. Flower, the artificially-expanded pleasure asteroid which we discover at the end, eventually becomes the first level of Major GrubertÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s private creation. For this, and more about Lady Kowalsky read The Airtight Garage, pages 92 seq., and Airtight Garage spin-off comic-book series, such as The Elsewhere Prince, The Onyx Overlord, etc.
Sixteen years ago, few guessed that the relative ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œbangÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ caused in France by the original publication of The Horny Goof was also the ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œbig bangÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ of the creation of the Moebius Universe.
Which is still expanding today"
